description:
Six side stories set in the world of Kabukicho! Get one more glimpse into the lives of James, Fuyuto, Watson, Torataro, and the rest of the Detective`s Row House!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moriarty no Shoutai / Chuumon no Ooi Truck / Hudson-fujin to Musuko / Mycroft-fukukuchou no Himitsu / Michelle no Doukyonin / Watson to Mary no Date
Moriarty`s True Identity / The Truck with Many Orders / Mrs. Hudson and Her Son / Deputy Mayor Mycroft`s Secret / Michel`s Roommate / Watson and Mary`s Date
モリアーティの正体 / 注文の多いトラック / ハドソン夫人と息子 / マイクロフト副區長の秘密 / ミッシェルの同居人 / ワトソンとメアリのデート
